mitigation_options.description: Materials used to let flood water enter a home with low advers imapcts
mitigation_options.restrictions: No longer effective if inundation depths are larger than 3 m and the duration of the flood is  longer than 1 day. practical only for portions of a home that are not used for living space, such as a basement

mitigation_options.description: Materials used to prevent floodwater from entering a home
mitigation_options.restrictions: maximum flood depth(3 ft), low velocity (1 or 2 ft/s), short duration. It is not recommended for homes with frame walls. It is not recommended for homes with basements because saturated soil may damage basment walls. The duration of the flood is  longer than 1 day.

mitigation_options.description: Levee is constructed using compacted soil while the flood wall is made of concrete or masonry.
mitigation_options.restrictions: levees and floodwalls are usually limited to 6 feet and 4 feet. levees and floodwalls should provide at least 1 foot of freeboard. For a levee, soil type and slope shoud be cosidered. Levess is effective for low velocity and flood durations of no more than 3 to 4 days.
